item.description:
I called the restaurant and they said that many of their dishes are vegan or could be made vegan.
Please RSVP so I can make a reservation.

Thali Too
65 Broadway
New Haven, CT, 06511

Take exit 47 (from 95) on the left to merge onto CT-34 W toward Downtown New Haven 1.0 mi
Exit onto CT-34 W/N Frontage Rd 0.2 mi
Turn right at York St 0.4 mi
Turn left at Broadway, 102 feet to Barnes and Noble Bookstore. Thali Too is directly in back of Barnes & Noble through the glass archway
item.how_to_find_us: I will make a reservation for Vegan Meetup (if we have more than 8 attendees)

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Very Late May Vegan Meetup
